MID-BACK LEATHERSOFT DESK CHAIR: Adds stylish, comfortable seating to any office, nail salon, car shop, store, at-home work desk, or college dorm room, helping busy workers or students achieve maximum comfort as they work

UPGRADE YOUR WORKSPACE: Boasts a soft mid-back white LeatherSoft back and seat paired with a gold metal base and armrests all highlighted by an attractive horizontal line stitching to boost your desk or work area with modern style

PADDED SEAT AND ARMRESTS: Thickly padded waterfall front seat helps relieve pressure from the legs while the padded armrests relieve pressure from your neck so you can take on long work days without discomfort

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE SEATING: Features a pneumatic height adjustable swivel seat for easy maneuverability and tilt lock mechanism that lets you tilt the chair backwards or lock it in an upright position

body.description: Amplify any office or workspace with the comfort and modern style of the Flash Furniture Whitney LeatherSoft Office Desk Chair. This mid-back LeatherSoft swivel office chair adds stylish, comfortable seating to any work area to help busy workers or students achieve maximum comfort day after day while performing their work duties. Not only does this swivel desk chair work great for offices, it also thrives in nail salons, car shops, retail stores, at-home work desks, college dorm rooms, or student study spaces. It boasts a soft and durable mid-back white LeatherSoft back and seat paired with a gold metal base and armrests all highlighted by an attractive horizontal line stitching to effortlessly boost your desk or work area with modern style. Packed with ergonomic features, the thickly padded waterfall front seat helps relieve pressure from the legs while the soft padded armrests relieve pressure from your neck so you can take on long work days without discomfort. Additionally, the highly customizable chair features a pneumatic height adjustable swivel seat for easy maneuverability and tilt lock mechanism that lets you tilt the chair backwards or lock it in an upright position to create a comfortable, custom seating experience. Lean back while as you enjoy your lunch break or take a quick phone call, or lock in an upright position once it's time to focus. This stylish mid-back office chair measures 23" W x 24" D x 37-40.75" H and can be assembled quickly with the included tools and step-by-step instructions, and it wipes clean with a damp cloth for easy cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Black Leather Executive Swivel Chair with Chrome Base and Arms Arms Padded arms for hours of comfort. Controls The tilt lock mechanism offers a comfortable rocking/reclining motion. The free rein motion is great for taking a quick break from typing to answer phone calls and relax. The pneumatic adjustment lever will allow you to easily adjust the seat to your desired height. Seat The waterfall front seat edge removes pressure from the lower legs and improves circulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for after a long search I am so glad I went with this chair. It’s beautiful, easy to assemble, and COMFORTABLE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, feels good, easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: it was easy to assemble with minimal tools and effort. The gold looks good with the seat material. it sits pretty good too. We will see how durable to cushioning is on it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You will need to purchase different wheels
reviews.reviewText: Love the look and feel of this chair. Very glam if that's what you're going for. Smooth and soft comfort while seated. Assembly was quick and easy. However, you will want to order new wheels. Do not bother with the ones that came with this chair (not pictured, black cheap plastic). As you can see in my pictures I have hard floors so one would think this chair would move with ease. IT DOES NOT. Gets stuck constantly when you try to move, are noisy and it will annoy you to no end. Not sure why they used such cheap wheels for a chair at this price point. The wheels are on Amazon for $20. Go ahead and buy them now so they arrive with the chair. After this quick fix I love the chair. I got white wheels to match and they glide and make zero noise (unlike the ones that come with the chair). You will not be disappointed once you tweak the chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for at-home desk
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair for my home office and I love it! Not only is it aesthetically pleasing but it functions really well. I love that it rolls smoothly, it’s super comfortable, the height is adjustable, and it hasn’t caused me any back pain. I use this chair several hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfy, and trendy!
reviews.reviewText: I love how beautiful this chair looks in my office! Gold and white is very trendy nowadays and it’s also so comfortable. It helps me sit up straight. Posture is actually so important in helping with productivity so I think this chair really improves that for me. The assembly instructions were very straight forward as well. I would definitely recommend this to a friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best costumer services and great product
reviews.reviewText: The chair arrived with a tear in the armrest, but the costumer service was excellent and the chair is great. The chair arrived in a large box and everything was packaged either with bubble wrap or in its own box. I received all of the pieces and instructions. They give you all of the tools you need to put the chair together and it only took me about 8 minutes or so to put together. Upon arrival, one of the arms of the chair had tear in the fabric. I assembled it anyways, and decided I would try to my fate with customer services. On the outside of the box that the chair arrived in, there was a customer service line. It said to call this number instead of returning. I called the number was greeted quickly. The woman on the phone was quick. She asked me if I still had the box, and ask for me to read her a number off the shipping label. I did that and it pulled up my shipping address and contact information and she knew who I was and my information without me having to tell them over the phone. Then she asked if I still had the instructors to assemble the chair, I told her yes, and she asked me to find the part I needed replace and look for the part number next to it. I gave her the information, and she said it would ship the next day and asked if I would like an e-mail with the tracking information. I said yes. I actually received an e-mail with the tracking information and I received the replacement part. Not only that, I received two arms. The entire process was painless and quick. Possibly the best, fastest and easiest costumer service I've ever experienced. The chair is a bright white. It tilts back, raises and lowers easily. Spins. The assembly was simple. The product exceeds my expectations and so did the costumer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair is beautiful and comfortable. It came in a large amazon box and as soon as I cut the tape all of the pieces fell out of the box without any kind of other packaging or protective plastic. Just a bunch of heavy jumbled parts. It's no wonder one of the armrests had a huge, deep scratch in it. Thankfully, we don't use the armrests anyway. I did reach out for replacement arm rests or partial refund - no one got back to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay-ish chair but uncomfortable back
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this chair was mostly fine with one serious problem: the back isn't well supported. It looks like a solid back but it's just a metal frame with fabric and elastic in the interior of the back. When I lean back into the chair, the back just gives way (see second picture). My last chair had a continuous board in the very back so that the back padding compressed against something sturdy. This chair just seems to have an elastic band buried in there. Even worse, I can feel it when I lean back. Another minor gripe is that the chair felt a bit small but that could just be that I'm used to somewhat oversized chairs and I like to sit cross-legged in the chair sometime.Other than that, the chair was fine. It arrived on time and undamaged. The packaging was reasonable and assembly was quick. There were some minor imperfections (first and third pictures) but nothing serious. Disassembly was a bit of a PITA but that's not really the manufacturer's fault.It looks pretty nice. Too bad it doesn't feel that nice.

Me gusta que para lo bonita y bien hecha que está no la considero cara a comparación de otras que he visto más endebles o de plástico. Bien bien reforzada, se arma fácilmente hasta por mera lógica sin instructivo… es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Está cómoda aparte de elegante.
Very comfortable; ergonomic and easy to assemble. Herman miller duper!
Got a couple days ago. Comfy, looks great.

First off….grab a friend to help put it together as you’ll need it. Once it’s together….wow. Great quality. Comfortable. High back. A perfect piece for your office. Stunning actually. Highly recommended.

Kind of expensive but definitely worth the money :)I’ve always been dreaming of a white office chair and this is probably the best one I could find.It only takes me 20mins to assemble and its very study.Very comfy as well I can spend a whole day on it.Great purchase:)
